Make Lilo your search engine ie Lilo Web Images News Video Maps Google More... Google Wikipedia Filters Make Lilo your search engine ie Who's lilo? (current) The projects FAQ Lilo, the search engine with substance Fund life changing projects of your choice for free - simply through your internet searches. And because we believe your privacy is important, we protect your personal data while you're searching Lilo funds for free life changing projects of your choice lall thanks to your web searches. Respects your privacy & your personal data. Make Lilo your search engine ie Help save sea turtles with Sea Shepherd 676 365 monthly users 41 833 672 monthly searches 2 739 836 € donated so far How does it work? Search Search the web as normal using Lilo as your search engine Collect Every time you search, you’ll gain one water drop. More searches = more water drops. Support Support the projects you care about most by giving them your water drops. Smile Every month, Lilo will transfer the money donated to each project Changing the world with le Mouvement Colibris Want to make a positive impact by making just one small change? Take something as simple as the search engine you use. Every search you do on the internet generates advertising revenue which collectively adds up to around €98 million a year. But instead of banking that revenue, how about a search engine that uses that money for the power of good? At Lilo, we let you use that money to fund social and environmental projects. You get to decide where the money you generate with advertising goes. Whether that’s preventing deforestation in the Amazon, supporting street kids or protecting the turtles from poaching, you get to support projects and causes you care about simply through your searches. Lilo is the search engine designed to provide great search results and do some good along the way. So why not switch your search engine and join our mission today? Want to make a positive impact by making just one small change? Start using Lilo today. Make Lilo your search engine ie Learn more about the projects your searches are supporting Take action on environmental issues Help those in need Support animal rights Le Mouvement Colibris 109504 € Sea Shepherd France 122952 € Arutam Zéro Déforestation 76081 € Médecins du Monde 47363 € LA FONDATION NICOLAS HULOT POUR LA NATURE ET L’HOMME 10230 € Association Petits Princes 64938 € Le Mouvement des AMAP 20914 € MIAA 26382 € Kalaweit 44772 € Coeur de Forêt 17429 € Coral Guardian 22173 € Agrisud International 33006 € See all projects Acting with the Society for the Protection of Animals (SPA) How can a search engine help fund projects for free? That's a very good question. It's exactly the question we asked ourselves when we were setting up Lilo. A little known fact is that search engines generate an awful lot of money every year through the sponsored links and ads at the top of every page of search results. Globally, this figure is around 98 billion Euros. 98 billion Euros. Just from people searching for the best ice cream recipe or where the nearest post office is. And who generates that money? You do. At Lilo, we wanted to create a search engine that allows you to control the money you generate and spend it on things that matter most to you. So we decided to develop a search engine that would allow users to take control of the money generated by their web searches and use it to fund whichever social and environmental projects they fancied. redistributes half its advertising income to life changing social and environmental projects across the world whilst respecting our users privacy along the way. So that's what we've done. 50% of all money generated goes towards the different social and environmental projects we support. The other 50% helps to maintain the proper functioning of our search engine so that you always have the fastest, most relevant results. Since we launched, Lilo has already helped to allocate 2.8 million Euros to the projects we fund. And this is just the beginning... Does Lilo provide the same quality results as the search engine I currently use? Absolutely. Our mission is to help you quickly find everything you're looking for on the internet. We don't compromise on results relevance and use the same algorithms as the largest search engines. Lilo is different though so it may take a couple of days to get used to. For instance, your previous search engine may have stored your favourite websites by tracking your clicks for certain searches. Because we don't have access to that information, we'll need to get to know you better. Don't worry, it'll happen quickly, but you can expect a tiny algorithm experience curve. There may also be some small differences on some specific features. For example, if you search for the weather forecast on Lilo, you will be redirected to a website showing the weather forecast, while other search engines can show it directly. This direct answer is not available yet on Lilo but it's something we're working on. Same goes for voice control. Searching with Lilo means you can find what you want and do some good along the way. Does Lilo protect my privacy ? . Privacy policies on the web can be as hard to trust as the gossip columns. That's why we are committed to being transparent about ours. We've all had that unsettling feeling of being tracked on the internet. With Lilo, this is impossible. We don't accept any scripts or third party cookies. Nor do we sell your search data to any advertising agencies or anyone else for that matter. With Lilo, your searches are never sold or spied on Your privacy is your business and your personal data is just that - personal. You choose what tracking and statistics you're comfortable with Find out more What kind of projects can I support through Lilo ? As many as we can offer. It's a choice we made right at the beginning when we created Lilo. We believe there is not one but plenty of different ways to make good things happen. So our aim is support as many projects as we can. That means you can choose to support the fight against Amazon deforestation, help disadvantaged children in your local area, protect turtles in Mayotte from poaching and more. For us, Lilo's strength lies in the diversity of the projects we support. That's why you'll find more than a hundred different projects on our site. Some are run by large NGOs, others by small neighbourhood associations. From projects related to environmental and climate issues to those helping people in need and defending animal rights, all the projects we support have something in common - they are all seeking to make a positive social and environmental impact. But it's up to you which project(s) you decide to support. Just search away, let your drops build up and donate to whichever projects you care about most. Make Lilo your search engine ie RETURN Your internet searches will soon be funding brilliant social and environmental projects Our teams have not yet had the chance to work on your browser. But don't worry, you will still be able to use Lilo. installing it manually. It's very easy. 1 Click on add Lilo 2 Follow the instructions (To know more more) 3 And welcome to Lilo! Add Lilo to the Lilo Who's Lilo? Press Room Recruitment Privacy Legal Mentions Legal UGC Policy of confidentiality Submit a project Contact us autocomplete($("#lilo-search")); jQuery(doOnload);

Changing the world with le Mouvement Colibris
Want to make a positive impact by making just one small change?
Take something as simple as the search engine you use. Every search you do on the internet generates advertising revenue which collectively adds up to around €98 million a year. But instead of banking that revenue, how about a search engine that uses that money for the power of good?
At Lilo, we let you use that money to fund social and environmental projects. You get to decide where the money you generate with advertising goes. Whether that’s preventing deforestation in the Amazon, supporting street kids or protecting the turtles from poaching, you get to support projects and causes you care about simply through your searches. Lilo is the search engine designed to provide great search results and do some good along the way. So why not switch your search engine and join our mission today?

Acting with the Society for the Protection of Animals (SPA)
How can a search engine help fund projects for free?
That's a very good question. It's exactly the question we asked ourselves when we were setting up Lilo.
A little known fact is that search engines generate an awful lot of money every year through the sponsored links and ads at the top of every page of search results. Globally, this figure is around 98 billion Euros. 98 billion Euros. Just from people searching for the best ice cream recipe or where the nearest post office is. And who generates that money? You do.
At Lilo, we wanted to create a search engine that allows you to control the money you generate and spend it on things that matter most to you. So we decided to develop a search engine that would allow users to take control of the money generated by their web searches and use it to fund whichever social and environmental projects they fancied. redistributes half its advertising income to life changing social and environmental projects across the world whilst respecting our users privacy along the way. So that's what we've done. 50% of all money generated goes towards the different social and environmental projects we support. The other 50% helps to maintain the proper functioning of our search engine so that you always have the fastest, most relevant results.
Since we launched, Lilo has already helped to allocate 2.8 million Euros to the projects we fund. And this is just the beginning...
Does Lilo provide the same quality results as the search engine I currently use?
Absolutely. Our mission is to help you quickly find everything you're looking for on the internet. We don't compromise on results relevance and use the same algorithms as the largest search engines. Lilo is different though so it may take a couple of days to get used to. For instance, your previous search engine may have stored your favourite websites by tracking your clicks for certain searches. Because we don't have access to that information, we'll need to get to know you better. Don't worry, it'll happen quickly, but you can expect a tiny algorithm experience curve. There may also be some small differences on some specific features. For example, if you search for the weather forecast on Lilo, you will be redirected to a website showing the weather forecast, while other search engines can show it directly. This direct answer is not available yet on Lilo but it's something we're working on. Same goes for voice control.
Searching with Lilo means you can find what you want and do some good along the way.
Does Lilo protect my privacy ?
. Privacy policies on the web can be as hard to trust as the gossip columns. That's why we are committed to being transparent about ours. We've all had that unsettling feeling of being tracked on the internet. With Lilo, this is impossible. We don't accept any scripts or third party cookies. Nor do we sell your search data to any advertising agencies or anyone else for that matter. With Lilo, your searches are never sold or spied on Your privacy is your business and your personal data is just that - personal. You choose what tracking and statistics you're comfortable with Find out more
What kind of projects can I support through Lilo ?
As many as we can offer. It's a choice we made right at the beginning when we created Lilo. We believe there is not one but plenty of different ways to make good things happen. So our aim is support as many projects as we can.
That means you can choose to support the fight against Amazon deforestation, help disadvantaged children in your local area, protect turtles in Mayotte from poaching and more. For us, Lilo's strength lies in the diversity of the projects we support. That's why you'll find more than a hundred different projects on our site. Some are run by large NGOs, others by small neighbourhood associations.
From projects related to environmental and climate issues to those helping people in need and defending animal rights, all the projects we support have something in common - they are all seeking to make a positive social and environmental impact. But it's up to you which project(s) you decide to support. Just search away, let your drops build up and donate to whichever projects you care about most.

But it's up to you which project(s) you decide to support. Just search away, let your drops build up and donate to whichever projects you care about most.
Make Lilo your search engine ie

How can a search engine help fund projects for free?
That's a very good question. It's exactly the question we asked ourselves when we were setting up Lilo.
A little known fact is that search engines generate an awful lot of money every year through the sponsored links and ads at the top of every page of search results. Globally, this figure is around 98 billion Euros. 98 billion Euros. Just from people searching for the best ice cream recipe or where the nearest post office is. And who generates that money? You do.
At Lilo, we wanted to create a search engine that allows you to control the money you generate and spend it on things that matter most to you. So we decided to develop a search engine that would allow users to take control of the money generated by their web searches and use it to fund whichever social and environmental projects they fancied. redistributes half its advertising income to life changing social and environmental projects across the world whilst respecting our users privacy along the way. So that's what we've done. 50% of all money generated goes towards the different social and environmental projects we support. The other 50% helps to maintain the proper functioning of our search engine so that you always have the fastest, most relevant results.
Since we launched, Lilo has already helped to allocate 2.8 million Euros to the projects we fund. And this is just the beginning...
Does Lilo provide the same quality results as the search engine I currently use?
Absolutely. Our mission is to help you quickly find everything you're looking for on the internet. We don't compromise on results relevance and use the same algorithms as the largest search engines. Lilo is different though so it may take a couple of days to get used to. For instance, your previous search engine may have stored your favourite websites by tracking your clicks for certain searches. Because we don't have access to that information, we'll need to get to know you better. Don't worry, it'll happen quickly, but you can expect a tiny algorithm experience curve. There may also be some small differences on some specific features. For example, if you search for the weather forecast on Lilo, you will be redirected to a website showing the weather forecast, while other search engines can show it directly. This direct answer is not available yet on Lilo but it's something we're working on. Same goes for voice control.
Searching with Lilo means you can find what you want and do some good along the way.
Does Lilo protect my privacy ?
. Privacy policies on the web can be as hard to trust as the gossip columns. That's why we are committed to being transparent about ours. We've all had that unsettling feeling of being tracked on the internet. With Lilo, this is impossible. We don't accept any scripts or third party cookies. Nor do we sell your search data to any advertising agencies or anyone else for that matter. With Lilo, your searches are never sold or spied on Your privacy is your business and your personal data is just that - personal. You choose what tracking and statistics you're comfortable with Find out more
What kind of projects can I support through Lilo ?
As many as we can offer. It's a choice we made right at the beginning when we created Lilo. We believe there is not one but plenty of different ways to make good things happen. So our aim is support as many projects as we can.
That means you can choose to support the fight against Amazon deforestation, help disadvantaged children in your local area, protect turtles in Mayotte from poaching and more. For us, Lilo's strength lies in the diversity of the projects we support. That's why you'll find more than a hundred different projects on our site. Some are run by large NGOs, others by small neighbourhood associations.
From projects related to environmental and climate issues to those helping people in need and defending animal rights, all the projects we support have something in common - they are all seeking to make a positive social and environmental impact. But it's up to you which project(s) you decide to support. Just search away, let your drops build up and donate to whichever projects you care about most.

What kind of projects can I support through Lilo ?

That means you can choose to support the fight against Amazon deforestation, help disadvantaged children in your local area, protect turtles in Mayotte from poaching and more. For us, Lilo's strength lies in the diversity of the projects we support. That's why you'll find more than a hundred different projects on our site. Some are run by large NGOs, others by small neighbourhood associations.
